name: Brain anomaly detection system
desc: Built a TensorFlow-based MRI anomaly detection model with 82% accuracy. Developed Streamlit UI and real-time visualization of confidance

name: AI-Driven Content Platform for Students

name: Movie Recommendation System
desc: This application uses a collaborative filtering approach based on item-item cosine similarity to recommend movies
